mapper.select: SELECT B.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD AS SUBJECT_TYPE_CD , A.GRP_DTL_NM AS GRP_DTL_NM , A.GRP_DTL_CD AS GRP_DTL_CD , COUNT(*) AS QUIZ_CNT FROM CMMN_DTL_CD A, QUIZ_MSTR_INFO B WHERE A.GRP_DTL_CD = B.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD AND A.GRP_CD = '002' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY SUBJECT_TYPE_CD, A.GRP_DTL_NM, A.SRT_NO ORDER BY A.SRT_NO

SELECT A.GRP_DTL_NM AS SUBJECT_TYPE_NM , A.GRP_DTL_CD AS SUBJECT_TYPE_CD , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO WHERE SUBJECT_TYPE_CD = A.GRP_DTL_CD) AS QUIZ_TOTAL_CNT , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS X, QUIZ_MSTR_INFO Y WHERE X.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = Y.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ AND X.USER_ID = #{userId} AND Y.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD = A.GRP_DTL_CD) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DUPLICATE_YN FROM CMMN_DTL_CD A WHERE A.GRP_CD = '002' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SRT_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND SUBJECT_TYPE_CD = #{subjectTypeCd}

SELECT A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , A.EXAM_YEAR , A.EXAM_GRP_CD ,
, A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD ,
, A.EXAM_NO , A.SRT_NO , A.CONTENT , A.ANSWER , A.CMNTR , B.QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ , B.USER_ID , B.USER_ANSWER , B.ANSWER_CHK , B.USER_CHK_IMPRT , B.USER_CHK_CNFSD FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ, QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_ANSWER, USER_CHK_IMPRT, USER_CHK_CNFSD, ANSWER_CHK FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{userId}) B ON A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = B.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = #{quizMstrInfoSeq}
AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.EXAM_GRP_CD = #{examGrpCd} AND A.EXAM_YEAR = #{examYear} AND A.EXAM_NO = #{examNo} AND A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD = #{subjectTypeCd} ORDER BY A.SRT_NO LIMIT 1

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.EXAM_GRP_CD, A.EXAM_YEAR, A.EXAM_NO, A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD, A.SRT_NO) AS RNO , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD ORDER BY A.SRT_NO) AS QUIZ_NO , QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , EXAM_GRP_CD ,
, SUBJECT_TYPE_CD ,
, EXAM_YEAR , EXAM_NO , SRT_NO , CONTENT , ANSWER , CMNTR , TO_CHAR(REG_TS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO A WHERE 1 = 1
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUIZ_MSTR_INFO SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , MDFY_TS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = #{quizMstrInfoSeq}
